solution_line_template: Leila has {voltaire_viewers_per_day} x {leila_multiplier} = <<{voltaire_viewers_per_day}*{leila_multiplier}={leila_viewers_per_day}>>{leila_viewers_per_day} viewers per day.
So, she earns {leila_viewers_per_day} x ${earnings_per_view} = $<<{leila_viewers_per_day}*{earnings_per_view}={leila_earnings_per_day}>>{leila_earnings_per_day} per day.
Therefore, Leila earns ${leila_earnings_per_day} x {days_per_week} = $<<{leila_earnings_per_day}*{days_per_week}={leila_earnings_per_week}>>{leila_earnings_per_week} every week.
